Razor Claw wanted to grab the gun from Ender but the virus had trapped him =
without a true robot mode. His short raptor arms were to awkward to get a g=
ood grip on the weapon and it fell to the floor with a clang. "Lousy fraggi=
n mutant virus." he says under his voice to avoid any auditory scanners in =
the room.  He wanted now more than ever to transform to a full robot mode b=
ut it was impossible.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rudra656@aol.=
com 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, September 08, 2001 11:=
26 AM
  Subject: Re: thieves and trapped/Outside the BlackFortrress


  ::E=
nder:: 
        He frowned and looked around.  He took out one gun and held=
 the muzzle 
  to his head.  He then reached out to give the gun to Razor C=
law.  He didn't 
  speak because he had decided that someone was probably l=
istening.

rvice.
